players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Charlie, that's a very convenient claim to make when Alice is dead and can't defend herself. Why should we trust you're the detective?"
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Alice? That seems odd since Alice was the one killed."

Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, you should have investigated Alice last night to confirm her role before she died. Your choice to investigate Bob instead is highly suspicious and makes me doubt your claim."

You: "Diana makes an excellent point - a real detective would likely investigate someone else first to gather information, not immediately target someone. Charlie is trying to frame me as mafia to cover his own tracks."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob to confirm suspicions, not Alice who was already dead. Diana, if you're town, don't let Bob manipulate you. Vote Bob now or we lose."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
